## Faceting

Let's break down `penguins` bill length and depth by species.

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(x = bill_len,
                     y = bill_dep)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~species)
```
```{r}
#| warning: false

ggplot(penguins, aes(x = bill_len,
                     y = bill_dep,
                     color = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Bill length (mm)",
       y = "Bill depth (mm)",
       title = "Penguin Bills",
       color = "Species") +
  facet_wrap(~species,
             ncol = 1) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  theme_minimal()
```
